speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Mark calling from XYZ Collections. Am I speaking with Jane Doe?

speaker: Customer
text: Yes, this is Jane. What is this about?

speaker: Agent
text: I'm contacting you regarding your account balance. Before we proceed, can you verify your date of birth for me?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you, Jane. Can you also confirm your current address?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for that information. You currently have an outstanding balance of $500. How would you like to proceed with this payment?

speaker: Customer
text: I would like to set up a payment plan.

speaker: Agent
text: Absolutely, we can set that up. How much would you like to pay monthly?

speaker: Agent
text: That works. We will set up a payment plan for $100 per month. Your first payment will be due on the 5th of next month.

speaker: Customer
text: Sounds good. Thank you for your help!

speaker: Agent
text: You're welcome, Jane. Thank you for your time. Have a great day!
